abilities.name: Soundwave
abilities.description: Deal 112 damage to enemies in an area and knock them back.

abilities.name: Crossfade: Speed Boost
abilities.description: Passively increase the Movement Speed of Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes by 15%. Toggle to play Healing Boost instead.

abilities.name: Crossfade: Healing Boost
abilities.description: Passively heal Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes for 25 health per second. Toggle to play Speed Boost instead.

abilities.name: Amp It Up
abilities.description: Raise Lúcio's Crossfade track volume for 3 seconds, amping Healing Boost to 124 health per second and Speed Boost to 45% increased Movement Speed.

heroics.name: Sound Barrier
heroics.description: After 1 second, Lúcio and nearby Allied Heroes gain a 1392 point shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

heroics.name: Reverse Amp
heroics.description: Blast Lúcio's Crossfade track at enemy Heroes for 4 seconds, causing Healing Boost to inflict 112 damage per second and Speed Boost to slow for 45%. This ability is unaffected by Crossfade talents. Passive: Increase Amp It Up's duration to 4 seconds.
